thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SodaStream Acquires French Distributor

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SodaStream Acquires French Distributor
text:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - Sodastream International Ltd:
* SODASTREAM ACQUIRES FRENCH DISTRIBUTOR * SODASTREAM INTERNATIONAL LTD - ‍PURCHASE PRICE WAS EUR 17.5 MILLION, SUBJECT TO CUSTOMARY POST-CLOSING PRICE ADJUSTMENTS​
* SODASTREAM INTERNATIONAL LTD - PURCHASE PRICE WAS EUR 17.5 MILLION, SUBJECT TO CUSTOMARY POST-CLOSING PRICE ADJUSTMENTS.
* SODASTREAM INTERNATIONAL LTD - PURCHASE PRICE WAS EUR 17.5 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
